snippet.title: Dawnmaker - Launch Trailer | City builder / Deckbuilder / Board Game
snippet.description:
Dawnmaker is out now on Steam and itch.io! 

Buy it now on Steam 👉️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2749100/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=launch

Buy it now on itch.io 👉️ https://arpentor.itch.io/dawnmaker

Dawnmaker is a turn-based city building and deckbuilding game, made by 2 strategy fans. It feels like playing a solo board game. Build luminous cities, optimize your deck and create powerful combinations between buildings and cards to bring life back to a dead world.

And follow us on:
▶️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArpentorStudio
▶️ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Arpentor-Studio-100396392569735
▶️ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/arpentorstudio/

Sound by Pierre-François Renouf and music by Nicolas Cornil, from Studio Le Refuge - https://www.studiolerefuge.fr/
